CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"Laser 1/0 Black Simplex"), "Laser 1/0 Black Simplex, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"Laser 1/1 Black Duplex"), "Laser 1/1 Black Duplex, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"Sheet Size Length (Inches)"), "Sheet Size Length (Inches), ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"Sheet Size Height (Inches)"), "Sheet Size Height (Inches), ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"Overprint on litho shell"), "Overprint on litho shell, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"PDF soft proof"), "PDF soft proof, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"White paper proof"), "White paper proof, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Finishing__c ,"Hard copy proof"), "Hard copy proof",NULL)+''
CustomField.label: Mailing Finishing Formatting
